Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/1/1998
Subject: Progress of Angel Echevarria
Dear Sir,
Angel Echevarria has nothing more to prove at A Helena Handbaskets!
He has an AVG of .340 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Mike Matthews
Dear Sir,

He has an ERA of 2.76, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
